content.rendered:
The Week in Search

 

The Week in Search: A Weekly SEO News and Updates Column from the Studio SEO Team

The Week in Search is a weekly column that covers news, updates, and insights from the search industry. We strive to cover topics that are most relevant to search industry professionals and provide a little bit of context into the topic from inside the SEO industry itself.

Category:
  • Week in Search
  • No categories
August 21, 2020 The Week in Search: August 17 – 21, 2020

This week we talk Google Chrome updates, a new Bing Twitter & more!
